column1: Syosset is protected by the firefighters and EMTs of the Syosset Fire Department (SFD)
column2: which consists of five all-volunteer fire companies and one all-volunteer EMS company. The Syosset Fire Department currently operates out of three Fire Stations

column1: The 11791 ZIP Code includes portions of the incorporated villages of Muttontown
column4: which results in a Syosset mailing address. Consequently
column5: the news and media often erroneously report Syosset as the hometown of notable residents of said villages.
